profile:
Alo Upholstery & Interiors specializes in custom made furniture and re-upholstery including working with genuine leather, custom headboards, refinishing and antique restoration. We also do window treatments plus installation. 

We carry a wide range of fabric samples from Robert Allen, Joanne Fabrics, Maxwell Fabrics, Kravets, Charlotte Fabrics and etc. in our showroom for furniture and Drapery. 

*Estimates are free!* 

Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to see our latest projects.

profile:
Ideal Interiors (Carlos Upholstery)

Specializing in the refinishing and upholstery of antiques and custom furniture. 

RE-UPHOLSTERY & REFINISHING OF FINE FURNITURE & ANTIQUES
Carlos Upholstery Inc. has over 36 years of dedicated European craftsmanship in residential and commercial furniture restoration. 
We custom make:
Sofas
Chairs
Headboards
Bedspreads
Drapes
 
We have an excellent selection of designer fabrics and top-grade leathers. 
Resourceful homeowners are discovering the value in old pieces of furniture that are often better made than some of today’s manufactured pieces. 
One of today’s best buys is to restore valuable pieces of furniture by having them re-upholstered. If your sofa or chair has a good frame, it is well worth re-upholstering. 
A significant advantage is the panoramic range of colours and textures in fabric selection to suit your price point and décor. Have an expert examine your furniture to see if it’s suitable for restoration. 
Quality furniture can be restyled to suit your taste and match your décor. If your furniture needs repair, we can replace springs, rebuild the frame, add new padding, foam, Dacron and down. 
Not only are you assured of the appearance of your furniture, but you can also be certain of its construction. 
Re-upholstering is the perfect way to have beautiful, quality furniture - skillfully handcrafted by Carlos Upholstery Inc! 
Our craftsmanship is backed by a 3-year warranty

Feel free to give us a call on - 905-564-7191
